nodes.text: Crae was a human male and a lieutenant within the Sixth Kin, a criminal organization led by Wen Delphis that operated in the city of Canto Bight. Highly loyal to Delphis, Crae was also the mentor of both Ariole Yu and Just Lucky, having trained them since a young age. Despite his loyalty, Crae supposedly betrayed the Sixth Kin, fleeing Canto Bight to meet with his handler at Crimson Dawn's auction of Han Solo. After learning of Crae's treachery, Delphis dispatched the Sixth Kin lieutenant Ariole Yu and the assassin Just Lucky to eliminate Crae and his contact.
